items.content_html: After an exhaustive week with many bugs solved and others to solve, finally the weekend. Java, in addition to being very verbose, is kind of boring to find agile solutions to HTTP request problems.

items.content_html:
Finished reading: The Number Devil by Hans Magnus Enzensberger 📚

Most people think this book is only for children, but after reading it, my feeling is that everyone except mathematicians should read this book.
items.content_text:
Finished reading: [The Number Devil](https://micro.blog/books/9781429932424) by Hans Magnus Enzensberger 📚

Most people think this book is *only* for children, but after reading it, my feeling is that everyone except mathematicians should read this book.

items.content_html: We need to talk about Fortran and COBOL languages. They are still among the world’s most popular programming languages despite being almost 70 years old. The may 2024 edition of the TIOBE Index show that this programming languages yet in the top the most used in the world.
items.content_text: We need to talk about Fortran and COBOL languages. They are still among the world's most popular programming languages despite being almost 70 years old. The may 2024 edition of the [TIOBE Index](https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/) show that this programming languages yet in the top the most used in the world.
